question: [File: aptos-core/consensus/consensus-types/src/pipelined_block.rs] [Function: deserialize()] [Validation bypass] Can an attacker craft serialized blocks with malicious randomness values that are set via set_randomness() at line 264 without validation, bypassing VRF verification and manipulating leader election?
